直到炸物上桌---怎麼這麼厲害我的天啊！！？至少接觸過所有有賣炸物的店家，這間絕對是no.1，沒有之一！！！不管玉米餅、魚柳條、薯條都很不一般，每一口都充滿記憶點，何況沾了醬之後的不同衝擊感...

在離家不遠的所在，有這樣優秀的酒吧，不管炸物還是調酒，都是心目中一等一，沒話說！！！支持在地優質店家，一定要的~~~

This is definitely No.1, none of them!IntersectionIntersectionRegardless of corn cakes, fish willow strips, and fries, each bite is full of memory points, not to mention the different impact after the sauce ...

At least it is worth trying to try it slowly!At least these a few things you have tried, no matter what the concentration, can be comfortable with KO ~~~

Not far from home, there are such excellent bars, whether fried or bartending, it is a first -class in my mind, nothing to say!IntersectionIntersectionSupport in high -quality stores, it must be ~~~

Original: 走進這裡，會有一種突然走進一個不同時空的感覺。相對門外車流的喧囂，店內流瀉的是老闆精選的音樂，時而緩慢，時而輕快，時而帶有陣陣律動，撩撥不同的情緒。對於需要從世俗紛擾中離開一會兒的現代都市人來說，HangOut 是個可以讓人暫時遺忘外頭紛擾的空間，店內供應簡單卻美味的finger food像是雞翅、炸雞柳及nachos，再淺斟幾杯，舒緩眉間與心上的煩惱。同時獨自前往的女性也可以在這樣的氛圍中靜靜享受這獨有的寧靜，在柔和的旋律中感受遺世獨立。

The simple but delicious Finger Food in the store is like chicken wings, fried chicken willow and NACHOS. , Soothing the trouble between the eyebrows and heart.At the same time, women who go alone can also quietly enjoy this unique tranquility in such an atmosphere, and feel the independence of the world in the soft melody.

Original:
它是該地區最好的雞尾酒吧之一。
他們的菜單上有有趣的選擇，而且價格合理。有些雞尾酒味道獨特，值得一試（有些雞尾酒太Shim，但你可以隨時要求進行一些調整）。調酒師和工作人員都很友好而且樂於助人。我和我的朋友確實很喜歡這裡輕鬆的氛圍。
EN:
It is one of the best cocktail bars in the area.
Their menu has interesting choices and reasonable prices.Some cocktails have a unique taste and are worth trying (some cocktails are too shim, but you can ask some adjustments at any time).The bartender and staff are very friendly and helpful.My friends and I really like the relaxed atmosphere here.

Original: 與朋友和家人聚會的舒適場所。調酒師很友善，服務也很好。我必須說玉米片、泰式椰子咖哩和法國長棍麵包都很棒！
EN: A comfortable place with friends and family members.The bartender is very friendly and the service is also very good.I have to say that corn slices, Thai coconut curry and French longan bread are great!

Original: 台北上城區天母最好的雞尾酒吧。調酒師堅持每杯飲品的品質。喜歡喝酒的人一定要來 Hangout 享受這裡的舒適氛圍和起司玉米片。
EN: The best cocktail bar in Tianmu, Shangcheng District, Taipei.The bartender insists on the quality of each drink.Those who like to drink must come to Hangout to enjoy the comfortable atmosphere and cheese corn slices here.

Original: 天母很棒的小潛水酒吧，提供價格合理的精選飲品！室外/室內裝潢做得很有品味！飲料和服務都無可挑剔！強烈推薦！
EN: Tianmu's great diving bar, provide a reasonable selected drink!Outdoor/indoor decoration is very delicious!Drinks and services are impeccable!Recommended strongly!

Original: 不錯的酒吧和雞尾酒。高度推薦起司片！
EN: Good bar and cocktail.Recommend cheese film!

Original: 非常謹慎和喝冰啤酒的好地方。戶外座位非常適合吸煙者和雀躍者。裝飾是很棒的自拍道具。
EN: Very cautious and good place to drink ice beer.Outdoor seats are very suitable for smokers and jumping.Decoration is a great selfie prop.

Original: 天母最好的社區酒吧。工作人員很友好，食物很美味，雞尾酒是該地區最好的。店主里卡多（Ricardo）也是一位非常優秀的調酒師，他很關心他自己調配的飲料的品質。我們是常客，他們透過我們的訂單認識我們。
EN: The best community bar of Tianmu.The staff is very friendly, the food is delicious, and cocktails are the best in the area.The owner Ricardo is also a very good bartender. He is very concerned about the quality of his own beverages.We are regular customers, and they know us through our orders.

Original: 台北隱藏的寶石，非常舒適溫馨，老闆人很好，可以訂製雞尾酒！價格符合你的預期，是與朋友聊天的好地方
EN: The hidden gems in Taipei are very comfortable and warm. The boss is very good. You can customize cocktails!The price meets your expectations, is a good place to chat with friends

Original: 與店主里卡多聊得很開心 - 認為這是一個不錯的酒吧。我點了標明180NT的生啤酒。我喝了一品脫，覺得很棒，沒有質疑為什麼他們提供淡啤酒作為唯一的生啤酒選擇。後來因為倒了Carlsberg被收了240NT。我向英語說得很好的Ricardo解釋說，我是根據菜單點生啤酒的（180NT），而不是根據他們想倒的感覺。和他們說話沒有任何意義，我非常失望地離開了酒吧。結論……酒吧還不錯，但要小心被工作人員或老闆搞砸了。
EN: I was very happy to chat with the owner Licardi -I think this is a good bar.I ordered the raw beer that indicated 180NT.I drank a product and felt great. I didn't question why they provided light beer as the only choice for raw beer.Later, he was collected 240NT because Carlsberg was poured.I explained to Ricardo, who said well in English that I was based on the menu (180nt) based on the menu, instead of the feeling they wanted to fall.Talking to them is meaningless, and I left the bar very disappointed.Conclusion ... The bar is not bad, but be careful of being messed up by the staff or boss.

Original: 環境不錯，服務很好，而且裡面不允許吸煙，這對於5 星評論來說似乎是完美的，但是，我得到了伏特加酸橙，它沒有酸橙/檸檬汁，而是糖漿（味道很奇怪） ，雞尾酒可以改進。
EN: The environment is good, the service is very good, and smoking is not allowed inside, which seems perfect for 5 -star comments. However, I get Vodka Oranges. It does not have lime/lemon juice, but syrup (the taste is strange) Cocktails can be improved.

Original: 城裡最好的雞尾酒。里卡多是鎮上最好的調酒師。看看他的莫吉托和內格羅尼
